tha-ap313:1.2_0: for me to make an end of suffering.
tha-ap313:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
tha-ap313:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap313:3.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap313:3.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap313:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
tha-ap313:5.1_0: first part of the senior monks.
